"type": "javascript",
"title": "solution",
"value": "let readlineSync = require(\"readline-sync\");
var varx=readlineSync.questionInt(\"enter a number\")
if(varx%2===0){
console.log(\"divisible hai\")
}
else{
console.log(\"not divisible\")
}"
}
